title: Ticket #7111: Don't try to switch on  Docker Version when disabling docker caps
description: The docker version strings are starting to jump around non linearly. We used to disable some flags, notably no capabilities based on the docker version, but all modern dockers have this, so let's just do it unconditionally.
remarks:
2019-Jun-13 17:09:10 by gthain:
Also, it appears that along the way, docker changed the way to disable setuid from --no-new-privileges to --security-opt no-new-privileges
check_ins: 2019-Jun-13 17:10   Check-in [57153]: Always set no-new-privileges in docker universe the more portable way #7111 (By Greg Thain )
